title: Dirty Projectors’ David Longstreth Details Legend of Ochi Soundtrack Album, Shares New Songs: Listen
description: “Prelude,” “The Pond,” and “The River” precede the album’s April 25 release
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: “Prelude,” “The Pond,” and “The River” precede the album’s April 25 release
text: Dirty Projectors’ David Longstreth scored writer and director Isaiah Saxon’s new A24 movie, The Legend of Ochi, and he’s now announced the details of the soundtrack album. The album is out on the same day as the film’s theatrical release, April 25, and it’s preceded by three new songs. Listen to “Prelude,” “The Pond,” and “The River” below.While Longstreth’s Legend of Ochi album is largely orchestral, it does include a new Dirty Projectors song “Through the Long and Lonely Night,” an alternate version of which features in the movie. The Legend of Ochi stars Willem Dafoe, Finn Wolfhard, Helena Zengel, and Emily Watson. It premiered at Sundance in Janaury.Longstreth and Dirty Projectors just released a new album that they made with Stargaze, Song of the Earth.The Legend of Ochi (Original Soundtrack):01 Prelude02 The Library03 The Hunt04 Yuri Walks Across Town05 The Barn06 Checking the Traps07 You’re Not Like They Say08 Please Feed My Caterpillars09 I Am Strong and Cool10 The Dawn of Yuri’s Quest11 Kurkamart12 Get Out of My Car13 Petro on Horseback14 The Pond15 I Can Talk to You!16 Wood Block Ceremony17 Maxim Closing In18 Joy, Pain, Excitement, Fear19 The Showdown20 Yuri and Young Ochi Reunion21 Campfire22 Boy Whistles23 The River24 Action at the River25 Cavemouth26 The Caves27 Use My Axe28 The Shrine (Introduction)29 Ochisong Exaltation30 The Shrine (Finale)31 End Credits32 Through the Long and Lonely Night (The Legend of Ochi)tk
html:
Dirty Projectors’ David Longstreth scored writer and director Isaiah Saxon’s new A24 movie, The Legend of Ochi, and he’s now announced the details of the soundtrack album. The album is out on the same day as the film’s theatrical release, April 25, and it’s preceded by three new songs. Listen to “Prelude,” “The Pond,” and “The River” below.

While Longstreth’s Legend of Ochi album is largely orchestral, it does include a new Dirty Projectors song “Through the Long and Lonely Night,” an alternate version of which features in the movie. The Legend of Ochi stars Willem Dafoe, Finn Wolfhard, Helena Zengel, and Emily Watson. It premiered at Sundance in Janaury.

Longstreth and Dirty Projectors just released a new album that they made with Stargaze, Song of the Earth.

The Legend of Ochi (Original Soundtrack):

01 Prelude
02 The Library
03 The Hunt

05 The Barn

32 Through the Long and Lonely Night (The Legend of Ochi)
